About-Section.title: About
About-Section.discreption: I'm a passionate web developer with a love for crafting engaging and efficient web applications. As a freelancer, I bring expertise in various web development tools and technologies. Proficient in crafting dynamic and responsive user interfaces using technologies like React, Next.js, and vanilla Javascript
